Privacy policy

The only data stored by the app is the player's game progress (i.e. whether the tutorial has been completed, which levels are unlocked and number of stars achieved on each level).

None of this data ever leaves the app.

The developer does not collect any data on the user.

This Privacy Policy may be updated in the future. Any changes will be described on this page.

Please direct any questions regarding privacy to support@experimentalgravity.com.
